title: Bloomberg Law Brief: May Loses Brexit Challenge in Parliament
itunes:title: Bloomberg Law Brief: May Loses Brexit Challenge in Parliament
description:
Steven Peers, a professor at the University of Essex School of Law, and Catherine Barnard, a professor at the University of Cambridge School of Law, discuss the latest news in UK prime minister Theresa May’s effort to trigger article 50 by her self-imposed March 31st deadline. They speak with June Grasso and Michael Best on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
